optic.comm.ofdm.modulateOFDM¶

modulateOFDM(Nfft, G, pilot, pilotCarriers, symbTx, hermitSym)¶

OFDM symbols modulator.

Parameters

  • Nfft (scalar) -- size of FFT

  • G (scalar) -- cyclic prefix length

  • pilot (complex-valued scalar) -- pilot symbol

  • pilotCarriers (np.array) -- indexes of pilot subcarriers

  • symbTx (complex-valued array) -- symbols sequency transmitted

  • hermitSym (boolean) -- True-> Real OFDM symbols / False: Complex OFDM symbols

Returns

symbTx_OFDM -- OFDM symbols sequency transmitted

Return type

complex-valued np.array
